ratings.comment: Fantastic and engaging professor. Cares about and actually enjoys teaching. Frequently engages in discussion during lecture.
He is one of the best professor I have ever had! Highly recommended.

He was the best professor I've ever had. His lectures were absolutely hilarious, and his interactive lecture style made going to class so fun. He is the kind of professor whose classes you go out of your way to take. 

Expect his classes to be hard. But, he'll support you every step of the way. He's genuinely an amazing guy.
